MATERIAL_METAL.description: Standard non magical metallic material (iron, steel)

MATERIAL_STONE.description: Stone or chipped stone, used in primitive weapons or in non-industrial civilizations (spears, arrowheads, bullet)

MATERIAL_LEATHER.description: Material made out of processed animal skin

MATERIAL_SILVER.description: Silver makes weapon effective against super natural creatures that are immune to mundane weapon

MATERIAL_STEEL.description: Higher quality non magical material. Need high level of smithing

MATERIAL_POLYMER.description: this material can be either naturally or artificially produced (keratin and chitin are polymers). When artificially created, it is a non-conductive material made out of oil or resin, requires modern and heavy industry, resistant to fire, cold, acid, electricity
